title: Tooltip Component Contract
description: Contract extracted from Figma Untitled UI Tooltip component. This defines all required properties that the LIT component must implement.

source.notes: Extracted via Figma Desktop MCP get_design_context + get_screenshot

theme.notes: Light theme uses white background with dark text; Dark theme uses Gray/900 background with white text

arrow.description: Arrow position relative to the tooltip body
arrow.notes: Arrow is an SVG triangle that points toward the trigger element. 'bottom-center' means the arrow is at the bottom center of the tooltip

supportingText.description: Whether to show supporting/description text below the title
supportingText.notes: In Figma, boolean prop. In code, content via slot or string property. When true, padding changes from 8px to 12px vertical, and width is constrained (320-328px)

notes: Tooltip is a purely visual/informational component, no required props
All Figma component properties must have corresponding LIT @property decorators
Arrow is rendered as CSS triangles, not SVG images
supportingText in Figma is a boolean; in code it is a string property or slot
28 total variants: 2 themes x 7 arrow positions x 2 supportingText states
Width: auto for simple tooltips, 320-328px for tooltips with supporting text
